name: Pantle Beratung CFD-CAA-FSI
goal:
Objectives: research in numerical simulation methods for fluid flow, flow induced noise and fluid-structure interaction; high performance computing.
Vision: help to make the world less noisy;
Mission: provide customers with most detailed flow-noise prediction as early as possible throughout pre-development.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: HPC initiatives such as PRACE, Clean Sky EU, research initiatives such as MSCA, SME, FTI.
